mapper.select: select realname from job_file where num=#{num}
select fakename from job_file where num=#{num}
select realpath from job_file where num=#{num}

select num, id, name, title, content, writedate, readcount, isnotice, rn, fakename from (select num, id, name, title, content, writedate, readcount, isnotice, rownum rn, fakename from job_file natural join job_bd natural join person) where title like '%'||#{searchContent}||'%' order by rn desc

select num, id, name, title, content, writedate, readcount, isnotice, rn, fakename from (select num, id, name, title, content, writedate, readcount, isnotice, rownum rn, fakename from job_file natural join job_bd natural join person) where content like '%'||#{searchContent}||'%' order by rn desc

select num, id, name, title, content, writedate, readcount, isnotice, rn, fakename from (select num, id, name, title, content, writedate, readcount, isnotice, rownum rn, fakename from job_file natural join job_bd natural join person) where name like '%'||#{searchContent}||'%' order by rn desc
